title: mRemoteNG config xml stored and opened from OneDrive, OneDrive stuck syncing xml file
author: ivassallo19
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
So I started saving and opening the config xml from my OneDrive for Business local location, C:\Users\user\OneDrive - company.com.au\mRemoteNG-name.xml, and now OneDrive repeatedly gets stuck syncing that file. 0 KB out of 346 KB.
I created a subfolder C:\Users\user\OneDrive - company.com.au\mRemote\mRemoteNG-name.xml, and opened it from there, but it still happens.
If I close OneDrive and reopen, it processes and syncs files...

comments.author: jmiller76
comments.snippet:
Right click on the file and Choose "Always Keep on this Device".
It will still sync this way..  The issue is that it keeps removing the local copy and having to pull it again.
